nodes.text: A Herglic bounty hunter operated during the time of the Galactic Empire. The bounty hunter was hired by the Empire to track down the rogue archaeologist Chelli Aphra, alongside a droid and the Wookiee Black Krrsantan. The hunters, including the Herglic, who was accompanied by a Corellian hound, located Aphra on the planet Arbiflux. However, Krrsantan, who wished to collect a debt from Aphra, requiring the archaeologist alive, turned against the other hunters, killing the Herglic.
